remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果知道 对象的位置，请使用此方法从 对象检索该对象。Use this method to retrieve an object from an object, if you know its location. 如果知道对象的 属性或 属性的值，则可以使用 属性检索 对象。You can use the property to retrieve an object if you know the value of the object's property or property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类。The following code example shows how to use the class. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object
public: property System::Object ^ SyncRoot { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个对象，该对象可用于同步对 对象的访问。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the object.

value.span: 一个对象，该对象可用于同步对 对象的访问。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不是线程安全的。 is not thread safe. 派生类可以使用此属性提供自己的 类的同步版本。Derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the class using this property. 同步代码必须对 对象的 属性执行操作，而不是直接在对象本身上执行操作。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the property of the object, not directly on the object itself. 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具体而言，它与其他可能同时修改 对象的线程保持正确的同步。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might simultaneously be modifying the object.
